formElement.label: Configuration:
formElement.documentation: The name of the config which holds all the connection information. This must reference a valid existing configuration.

formElement.label: Vpc ID:
formElement.documentation: VPC to use for this subnet.

formElement.label: CIDR Block:
formElement.documentation: The range of IPs to use in subnet, in CIDR format, for example,10.0.0.0/24.The range of IP addresses in subnet must be subset of IP address in VPC.Size subnet can equal the size of VPC.

formElement.label: Availability Zone:
formElement.documentation: Availability zone where this subnet will reside.If no preferences is entered, Amazon will choose an availability zone for you.

formElement.label: Results Location:
formElement.documentation: Where to put the result. If not specified, the result is only printed.
